title: BIP 23: Badger Revenue Management Overview
body:
TLDR; Define starting parameters for DAO assets specifically focusing on a) Diversified Exposure and b) Assets put to Work

Results:
- ~19.5% one time pull, 
- ~49.7% ETH/50.3% DAI, 
- ~5.6% recurring, 
- ~35% one time add to LP

Link to discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-23-badger-revenue-management-overview/1842
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
